text: McDonell-Douglas DC-8-71(F) (N870SJ) at Miami International Airport. Mexicana Cargo was an airline based in Mexico City. It started operations in the 1980s and ceased operations in 1987. It was a Mexicana de Aviación subsidiary and operated cargo flights in Mexico and the United States. ==Destinations== Domestic *Cancún *Guadalajara *Mexico City *Monterrey *Tijuana International *Chicago *Los Angeles *Miami *Havana ==Fleet== * 3 Douglas DC-8 ==References== Category:Defunct cargo airlines Category:Defunct airlines of Mexico Category:Airlines established in 1980 Category:Airlines disestablished in 1987 Category:Mexicana de Aviación Category:1987 disestablishments in Mexico Category:Cargo airlines of Mexico
title: Mexicana Cargo
